about_the_game:
THIS DEMO IS A TESTING VERSION. IT HAS A LOT OF BUGS AND IMPROPER FEATURES

Schizophrenia is a psychological survival horror.

You don't remember anything. You have to survive in the bunker in order to get out of it. Look for and use all the items that come your way.

The bunker can be dangerous. Who knows who might even be there.

What to Expect in the Demo?

The demo version introduces the beginning of the game. Try to find the main staircase or anything that could help you escape the bunker.

FEATURES:

  • Bunker Exploration – Search rooms, uncover notes, clues, and important objects.

  • Looting and Inventory – Pick up useful items, combine them, and use them to survive.

  • Puzzles and Riddles – Unlock sealed doors, restore power, and find a way out.

  • Tense Atmosphere – Limited visibility, unsettling sounds, and the feeling of being watched.

  • Bunker Inhabitants – Could they be dangerous? What can you expect from them? Should you avoid them or find a weapon to defend yourself?

  • Bunker Dwellers - could the inhabitants of the bunker be dangerous? What can you generally expect from them? It’s better for me to get around them or better find weapons for protection.

Remember. The main thing is not to go crazy. And further. Don't make loud noises. They can hear you.

  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD FX 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0, Nvidia GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 5750 / Intel HD 630
